alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:20PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Beaverhead County through 245 PM MDT... At 220 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Lima, or 23 miles northwest of Dubois, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monida, Snowline and Monida Pass. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 10 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
